thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Benji & Tara Greig
thread.title_full: Airtasker reviewed by Benji & Tara Greig

author: Benji & Tara Greig
title: Benji & Tara Greig
text: We've heard from friends about Airtasker and mostly good things. We decided to give it a shot with a task that was difficult for us (not having the right tool). The process was straight forward and the network of people who replied where great. Overall pretty happy.
